New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 49th ODI century, equaling Sachin Tendulkar's record
Ravindra Jadeja took career-best figures of 5 for 33
Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja took 5 wickets for 33 runs
South Africa scored 83 runs in 27.1 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli's 101 was a memorable birthday gift to himself
India's victory was their eighth successive win in the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: India scored 326 for 5 in their innings
South Africa's total of 83 is their joint second-lowest in ODI cricket
Others: Lungi Ngidi was injured during the match
